room_title: Escape room "Escape from the Grande Strand Hotel" by Riddles Escape Room in Myrtle Beach
review: This was one of the best escape rooms at the beach for my family I really enjoyed the room we did which was The Grand Strand Hotel Room and it was very family friendly. This is a locally owned and operated business which I also like to support as well. The staff is very friendly and helpful as well which is a plus!!! Thanks again for an amazing experience Riddles until our next family vacation next year!!!

room_title: Escape room "Escape from the Grande Strand Hotel" by Riddles Escape Room in Myrtle Beach
review: On a rainy day, we booked the Grand Strand Hotel room for 8: 4 adults and 4 kids (8-13). The staff was super friendly and the room was really challenging yet fun. We definitely needed a lot of help :) I have done 3 other rooms at different places and this one was one of my favorites!

room_title: Escape room "Escape from the Grande Strand Hotel" by Riddles Escape Room in Myrtle Beach
review: Had a blast in the grand strand hotel escape room! Definitely will be back again.
